COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x154
STRING: I woke up in the morning feeling good.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x160
STRING: Until yesterday, I was afraid of admitting my feelings.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16c
STRING: Perhaps it was my imagination, but it seemed brighter
than usual outside.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x178
STRING: The rain must have eased off.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x184
STRING: I stretched out while still on my bed, and thought about
yesterday's events.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x190
STRING: What lay beyond the admission of my feelings, was Fal's
gentle smile.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d0
STRING: [Phorni] “Oh, morning. You're up on time today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e6
STRING: [Chris] “Ah, hey. Good morning.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x204
STRING: [Phorni] “And you even look refreshed, too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21a
STRING: [Chris] “...Actually, I just might be.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x24c
STRING: [Phorni] “What are you acting all cool about? You're
talking about yourself, you know?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x26c
STRING: [Chris] “I know. But I really do feel good today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x29e
STRING: [Phorni] “Oh, you just admitted it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b4
STRING: [Chris] “...Yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2e6
STRING: [Phorni] “I see.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2fc
STRING: [Chris] “What's up?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x32e
STRING: [Phorni] “Uh... Never mind. It's nothing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x344
STRING: [Chris] “...Phorni?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x376
STRING: [Phorni] “It's nothing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x38c
STRING: Phorni repeated herself, and smiled.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3b4
STRING: [Phorni] “It's a good thing. Much better than you looking
gloomy all day long.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3d4
STRING: [Chris] “Have I really been that gloomy?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x406
STRING: [Phorni] “If anyone would know, it'd be me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x41c
STRING: [Chris] “...I'm sorry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x44e
STRING: [Phorni] “Hmm? What about?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x464
STRING: [Chris] “About everything that's happened, and
everything that's going to happen.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x47a
STRING: I didn't say Arietta's name, but Phorni seemed to
understand correctly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x498
STRING: [Phorni] “Have you forgotten what she wrote in her
letters?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4ae
STRING: “Do as you like, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4ba
STRING: If this was my answer, then she would probably be
happy with it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4c6
STRING: [Chris] “...No, I remember. I get it, thanks Phorni.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4f8
STRING: [Phorni] “Thanking me won't help you much, though.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x50e
STRING: Phorni commented teasingly like this, and then pointed
to the clock.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x536
STRING: [Phorni] “Since you've gotten up so early, why don't you
go to school and get more practice in?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x556
STRING: [Chris] “...Okay, okay. I just might do that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x588
STRING: [Phorni] “Oh my, you're really going to go?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x59e
STRING: [Chris] “Hey, it was your idea.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5d0
STRING: [Phorni] “I was trying to praise you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5e8
STRING: It had been a while since Phorni and I chatted playfully
like this.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5fe
STRING: I had the feeling that today was going to be a good
day.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x61c
STRING: I quickly got ready and went outside, and found that it
was comfortable out, with the rain only being light.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x672
STRING: Just as I had felt earlier in the morning, everything went
smoothly today.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x68c
STRING: My fingers glided smoothly across the keys of my
Fortelle, and I even felt that I could hear every individual
note clearly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6a2
STRING: At times like this time always passed quickly, and before
I knew it we had already played until lunchtime.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6e0
STRING: However...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x710
STRING: [Fal] “Hey, Chris. Are you feeling out of form today?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x726
STRING: Fal asked me with a slightly mystified look on her face.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x732
STRING: [Chris] “Huh? Was something different than usual?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x764
STRING: [Fal] “... Ah, that's not what I meant.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x77a
STRING: [Chris] “I don't think I made any particular mistakes, and
I'm not in bad form either...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7a2
STRING: [Fal] “...Yes, I agree.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7b8
STRING: [Chris] “Hmm?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7ea
STRING: [Fal] “Oh, I'm sorry. I might have just been imagining it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x800
STRING: [Chris] “...Really? I hope that's the case.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x832
STRING: [Fal] “Yes, I'm sorry for bringing it up. I wasn't even sure
what I wanted to say myself.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x852
STRING: [Chris] “No it's fine, don't hesitate to point out anything
that doesn't seem right.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x88e
STRING: [Fal] “...Okay. So, why don't we practice one more time
after I finish work?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8ae
STRING: [Chris] “I said not to hesitate, but... Not in that way...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8e0
STRING: [Fal] “...The fact that we only have two more days left is
kind of weighing on me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x900
STRING: I thought it was just a joke directed at me for not
practicing enough, but it seemed that she was actually
serious.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x916
STRING: I hurriedly corrected myself.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x922
STRING: [Chris] “Oh, if that's what you mean, then sure. I can
practice anywhere you like.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x940
STRING: [Fal] “Really?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x956
STRING: [Chris] “Of course. But in return, you make me
something nice to eat, okay?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x988
STRING: [Fal] “If that's all you need, sure.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x99e
STRING: [Chris] “There's nothing I want more.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9d0
STRING: [Fal] “Hehe. Something is definitely wrong today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9e6
STRING: [Chris] “Was that strange?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa04
STRING: [Fal] “Yes, just a little.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa1a
STRING: [Chris] “Ugh, you're so mean.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa4c
STRING: [Fal] “Have you forgotten that you're the one who just
said to point out anything that doesn't seem right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa6c
STRING: [Chris] “...That's not what I meant.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa9e
STRING: [Fal] “You have a point there.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xabe
STRING: Fal cracked up laughing, and I ended up laughing too.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xad4
STRING: I never expected that we'd end up having such natural
conversations together.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaec
STRING: But things just might be good this way.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaf8
STRING: In the very least, I was satisfied with how things were.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb04
STRING: There were people who were saddened because of me,
but in reality there was no way to make everything
work out perfectly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb26
STRING: There was no ideal way of doing things, only a best
way.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb32
STRING: I searched my options, made a decision, and did my
best.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb40
STRING: Or at least, I was trying to do my best.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb96
STRING: [Chris] “In that case, let's meet in front of the trattoria
around the time you finish your shift. I don't want them
to confuse me for a customer.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbd2
STRING: [Fal] “That's true. But, if the rain gets heavier, you can
wait inside. I'll make sure it's okay with everyone.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbf2
STRING: [Chris] “Alright, See you then.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc10
STRING: [Fal] “Hehe, see you later.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc28
STRING: We made our plans, and then parted ways at the
intersection between my place and her trattoria.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc3e
STRING: I watched her walk until she was out of sight, and then
returned to my apartment.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc9a
STRING: [Phorni] “Oh, welcome back. You finish early today?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcb0
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, it's a Wednesday.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcc6
STRING: I wiped the droplets of water out of my hair with the
towel near the entrance of my apartment, and went
inside.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcf8
STRING: [Phorni] “But even so, aren't you home a little early?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd0e
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, we're going to rehearse again tonight.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd2c
STRING: [Phorni] “After Fal finishes work, you mean?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd42
STRING: [Chris] “That's right.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd74
STRING: [Phorni] “Wow, you're practically spending the whole
day together.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd8a
STRING: [Chris] “There's not much time left until the recital, after
all.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdbc
STRING: [Phorni] “And once it's over?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdd2
STRING: [Chris] “...What do you mean?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdf0
STRING: [Phorni] “Are things going to change?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe06
STRING: [Chris] “Well, of course they'll change.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe38
STRING: [Phorni] “...I don't mean it like that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe4e
STRING: [Chris] “Then, what do you mean?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe80
STRING: [Phorni] “Is the way you spend time with Fal going to
change?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe96
STRING: [Chris] “I guess this is a strange way to put it, but we
have no choice but to change. After we finish our
recital, we won't need to rehearse anymore...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xed2
STRING: [Phorni] “Does that mean the two of you won't have
anything to do with each other either?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xee8
STRING: [Chris] “...I'm not sure. But in the least, I don't think so.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf1a
STRING: [Phorni] “Good. That's what I wanted to hear.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf30
STRING: [Chris] “Why...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf62
STRING: [Phorni] “I just had to know. You don't need to
understand why.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf78
STRING: [Chris] “I can't help but feel curious if you put it like that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfaa
STRING: [Phorni] “More importantly, shouldn't you get some
rest?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfc0
STRING: [Chris] “Huh? Rest?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfde
STRING: [Phorni] “I was just thinking maybe you should take a
quick nap.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x100c
STRING: Though I think you'd nap even if I didn't suggest it to
you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1022
STRING: [Chris] “...So rude. But, I've been rehearsing all morning,
so I do need some kind of rest.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x105e
STRING: [Phorni] “Even though Fal is working right now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1074
STRING: [Chris] “...Urgh.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10a6
STRING: [Phorni] “I'm kidding. Everyone has their own pace, and
you have yours, too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10c6
STRING: [Chris] “Sure, sure... Well, I'm going to sleep for a bit.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10f8
STRING: [Phorni] “Good night.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x110e
STRING: [Chris] “But, it's quite rare of you to suggest I take a
nap.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1140
STRING: [Phorni] “Why not?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x116e
STRING: Isn't it nice for a change sometimes?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x117a
STRING: Prompted by Phorni, I took off my jacket and lay down
on my bed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1190
STRING: We'd been rehearsing constantly recently, and it
seemed I was considerably tired from it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11a6
STRING: After I buried my face in my pillow, I soon felt sleep
come for me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11b2
STRING: I asked Phorni to wake me up thirty minutes before the
time I planned to meet Fal, and then passed out.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11fa
STRING: [Phorni] “You're sleeping well.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1226
STRING: [Phorni] “Look at you, such a happy face while you
sleep.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x123c
STRING: I felt like I could hear a voice in the distance.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1250
STRING: [Phorni] “But, I'm glad you found someone who will be
with you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x126e
STRING: [Phorni] “Now I don't have to worry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12a8
STRING: [Chris] “...Phorni?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12ce
STRING: [Phorni] “Oh, you're awake?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12e4
STRING: [Chris] “Were you saying something?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1302
STRING: [Phorni] “Nope. Anyway, it's about time you got up.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1318
STRING: [Chris] “Already...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1346
STRING: I got up quickly in an attempt to shake off my
sleepiness, but because I did that, Phorni almost fell
from my pillow.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1364
STRING: [Phorni] “Eek!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x137a
STRING: [Chris] “Oh, sorry!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1390
STRING: I rushed to support her balance.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13b8
STRING: [Phorni] “Hey! Don't get up so quickly!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13ce
STRING: [Chris] “Sorry. But why were you sitting there anyway?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1400
STRING: [Phorni] “So that I could wake you up, of course.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1416
STRING: [Chris] “Usually you just do it from afar.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1448
STRING: [Phorni] “Some days I want to do it like this.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x145e
STRING: [Chris] “...Okay then. Anyway, what's the time?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1490
STRING: [Phorni] “It's still a little early.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14a6
STRING: [Chris] “...You were planning to wake me up, right? I
think you were doing something just then.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14e2
STRING: [Phorni] “Hmm? I was just peeking at you while you
slept.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14f8
STRING: [Chris] “Wh-Why were you watching me sleep?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1516
STRING: [Phorni] “Because I wanted to. C'mon, it's not like it'll kill
you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1536
STRING: [Chris] “I have no idea where you learned to speak like
that...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1568
STRING: [Phorni] “Okay! Time to get ready.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x157e
STRING: [Chris] “...Well, it would be rude to keep her waiting.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1594
STRING: I did as I was told and got ready to head out, but it was
still a little early.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15aa
STRING: I didn't want to get wet if it could be helped, so I
needed to pass some more time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15ec
STRING: Gazing out the window, I checked how it was outside.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15f8
STRING: The same as it was earlier, the rain was still light.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1604
STRING: I could have just left early, as I probably wouldn't have
much trouble finding shelter.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x166e
STRING: [Phorni] “Hey, it's still a little early. Are you going out
already?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1684
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah, that's the plan.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16b6
STRING: [Phorni] “...If that's the case, could I ask you to do me a
little favor?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x16cc
STRING: [Chris] “A favor? As long as it's nothing ridiculous. You
want me to take you with me, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1708
STRING: [Phorni] “No, nothing like that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1736
STRING: Could you put me on your shoulder for a little?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x174c
STRING: [Chris] “...Doesn't that mean you want me to take you
out?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x177e
STRING: [Phorni] “No, it doesn't. Now c'mon, let's go!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1794
STRING: [Chris] “Fine then.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17aa
STRING: I did as she requested, and put her up on my shoulder.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17d0
STRING: Phorni moved herself into a position that put her within
arm's reach of my ear, and began the chuckle softly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17e6
STRING: [Chris] “Hey! That t-t-tickles!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1804
STRING: [Phorni] “Just bear it a little a little longer.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x181a
STRING: [Chris] “I don't need to bear anything without a good
reason.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1838
STRING: [Phorni] “Well, I have a very good reason.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x184e
STRING: I suddenly felt like something touched my cheek.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x185a
STRING: It was just for a split second, making my hair flutter a
little as it brushed my cheek.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1888
STRING: In the blink of an eye, Phorni had floated down to the
nearby table, and was looking up at me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18ba
STRING: [Phorni] “Okay, have a nice night!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18d0
STRING: [Chris] “...What did you do just now?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1902
STRING: [Phorni] “It's a secret.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1918
STRING: [Chris] “A secret? You know that I...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x194a
STRING: [Phorni] “C'mon, get going! You'll be late.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1960
STRING: [Chris] “Alright... You can tell me when I get back.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x197e
STRING: [Phorni] “Sure. See you later!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1994
STRING: [Chris] “...Weird little fairy.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19aa
STRING: Phorni was acting a bit strange, but I left her at home
and headed to the trattoria.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x19fc
STRING: It was still a little early when I arrived in front of Copert.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a12
STRING: The rain hadn't gotten any heavier, so I decided I would
be okay waiting outside.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a30
STRING: After waiting like this for a few moments, the door soon
opened and out came Fal.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a6a
STRING: [Fal] “Sorry to keep you waiting. You could have waited
inside, you know?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a80
STRING: [Chris] “It's not that bad out here.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1a96
STRING: I looked up at the sky, as if to check that the rain was
still light.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1aaa
STRING: [Fal] “Oh, I see. But, I wouldn't want you to get any
wetter than you are, so let's go.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1aca
STRING: [Chris] “Do you need to do any shopping?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ae8
STRING: [Fal] “I bought everything I needed before my shift. I can
start cooking as soon as we get back to my place.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b20
STRING: Are you hungry?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b2c
STRING: [Chris] “Pretty hungry, yeah. I didn't eat anything for
lunch today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b5e
STRING: [Fal] “Good. I'm hungry too, so I'll start as soon as we
get back.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1b7e
STRING: [Chris] “Great, can't wait.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bd0
STRING: Being able to eat truly delicious food with the person
that you want to eat it with, just might be the stuff of
happiness.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bf0
STRING: It was small, and probably insignificant.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1bfc
STRING: A small happiness that for some people may have been
laughable.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c0a
STRING: But I'm sure that some others would have also felt what
I felt.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c22
STRING: I treasured the time we were sharing, hoping that the
girl in front of my eyes was feeling the same way.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c8c
STRING: [Fal] “Well, now that our stomachs are satisfied, shall
we start rehearsing?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ca2
STRING: After our little food break, we returned to our main
purpose for being here.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cae
STRING: I was thinking about what it was that Fal said was
bothering her, but the only thing I could do right now
was my utmost to make it the best performance ever.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1cce
STRING: I set up my Fortelle in its position, and finished my
preparations as quickly as I could.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ce4
STRING: [Chris] “I'm good to go.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d16
STRING: [Fal] “For the time being, let's rehearse in the same way
we did earlier today. It's possible that I was just
imagining that something didn't sound right, after all.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d36
STRING: [Chris] “I hope that's the case.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d68
STRING: [Fal] “Okay then, let's begin.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d8a
STRING: Taking her words as a signal, we began our rehearsal.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1d98
STRING: My fingers didn't stop.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1da6
STRING: I wasn't in bad form.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1db2
STRING: Actually, it would be fine to say I was playing well.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1dcc
STRING: But...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1dd8
STRING: Even I could feel that something was lacking.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1de6
STRING: Something emotional, that couldn't be put into words.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1df4
STRING: When I was thinking about this kind of thing, unable to
concentrate properly on my performance, Fal stopped
singing immediately and looked at me with an
expression of concern.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e4a
STRING: [Fal] “Chris...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e60
STRING: [Chris] “Ah... Sorry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e7e
STRING: [Fal] “Something isn't right, is it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e94
STRING: [Chris] “Maybe, yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ec6
STRING: [Fal] “Are you okay?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1edc
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ef2
STRING: I'm sure she was genuinely concerned about me, but
even more so, she must have been worried because the
recital was waiting for us the day after tomorrow.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f08
STRING: [Chris] “I'm alright, I think.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f3a
STRING: [Fal] “...As long as you are”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f50
STRING: [Chris] “I'm really sorryabout this...especially at a time
like this.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f82
STRING: [Fal] “No, it's okay. As long as nothing is wrong. The
recital is the only day that matters.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1fa2
STRING: Unable to say anything in response, I simply nodded.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2006
STRING: I rehearsed many times after this, and by the time I went
to go home, it was already the middle of the night.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x201c
STRING: We agreed to rehearse again tomorrow, and went to
the entrance of her apartment.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2030
STRING: [Fal] “Okay, I'll see you again tomorrow.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2046
STRING: [Chris] “Sure. That thing from today might be different
again after a good nights sleep.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2064
STRING: [Fal] “...Okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x207a
STRING: [Chris] “Well, I'll be going, then.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20ac
STRING: [Fal] “Wait.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20c2
STRING: [Chris] “What's up?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20e0
STRING: [Fal] “Did anything... Happen recently?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x20f6
STRING: [Chris] “No... Not particularly.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2128
STRING: [Fal] “Really?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x213e
STRING: Fal came closer to me, as if to inspect what was behind
my eyes, and the distance between our faces became
small.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2154
STRING: At a distance where I could feel her breath on the tip of
my nose, Fal continued speaking.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x217c
STRING: [Fal] “You can tell me if something happened, you
know, just like when we discussed all those things last
time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x219c
STRING: [Chris] “Y-Yeah, but I'm okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21ce
STRING: [Fal] “I mean it, you know?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21e4
STRING: I couldn't stop my cheeks from flushing.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x21f0
STRING: It was because I suddenly remembered what happened
the other day in the practice room.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2206
STRING: I had the feeling that if I were to draw her closer to me
now, that she wouldn't resist.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x224e
STRING: Noticing the change in me, Fal also went red and
quickly slid back a step.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2264
STRING: [Chris] “Ah... Sorry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2296
STRING: [Fal] “N-No, it's fine.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22ac
STRING: Fal gasped lightly and made a face that said she had
realized something, perhaps the answer to her own
question.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22c2
STRING: It started to feel a little awkward between us, and I
didn't feel like I wanted to do anything further.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x22d8
STRING: [Chris] “...Well, it's getting late so I should probably
head home.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x230a
STRING: [Fal] “Sure.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2338
STRING: Oh, do you mind if I ask one last thing?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2344
STRING: [Chris] “Go ahead.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2376
STRING: [Fal] “Do you feel happy, Chris...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x238c
STRING: [Chris] “...I think so.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23a2
STRING: Her question was sudden so I gave an ambiguous
response, and then corrected myself.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23b8
STRING: [Chris] “No, I think I am happy.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x23ea
STRING: [Fal] “...I see.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2404
STRING: But even then, Fal looked away and shifted her gaze to
the floor in response to my slightly hesitant answer.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x241a
STRING: Immediately after that she raised her gaze, and the only
thing I could see on her face was her usual smile.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2430
STRING: However, I didn't know what kind of expression was on
her face before that.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2470
STRING: Comfortably tired... Was almost the right way to explain
the fatigue that enveloped me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2486
STRING: I dried my hair quickly with the towel that was placed
back in my doorway, and went straight to my bed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x249c
STRING: Perhaps Phorni had already disappeared for the night,
as she didn't welcome me back or say good night to
me.
